translation: Thus the perfection of wisdom is not stained by attachment, because worldly phenomena cannot stain it.

translation: Thus the perfection of wisdom is far removed from all the blindnesses and dazzlements of the three realms, because it can remove the darkness of defilements and views.

translation: In this way the transcendent wisdom-pāramitā is the supreme leader, because it is the ultimate preeminent among all the factors conducive to enlightenment.

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多能作安隱，永斷一切驚恐逼迫災橫事故；
translation: Thus the perfection of wisdom can make peace, forever eliminating all fearful and oppressive misfortunes.

translation: Thus the perfection of wisdom can give light, because it receives sentient beings and enables them to attain the five eyes.

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多能示中道，令失路者離二邊故；
translation: In this way the perfection of wisdom can show the middle path, because it lets the one who loses the path be free from two extremes.

translation: Thus the perfection of wisdom is able to develop knowledge of all characteristics, because it permanently eliminates the stream and habit energy of all afflictions.

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多是諸菩薩摩訶薩母，菩薩所修一切佛法從此生故；
translation: Thus the perfection of wisdom is the mother of great enlightening beings, because all the buddha-teachings cultivated by enlightening beings are born from this.

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多不生不滅，自相空故；

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多離一切生死，非常非壞故；
translation: In this way the perfection of wisdom is free from all births and deaths, because it is neither eternal nor destructive.

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多能為依怙，施諸有情正法寶故；
translation: In this way the perfection of wisdom can be a refuge, because it bestows on sentient beings the treasure of true doctrine.
